title: C-MORE HMI EA9 EA-HTTP Missing Authentication for Critical Function Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to issue commands on affected installations of C-More HMI EA9 touch screen panels. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the EA-HTTP.exe process. The issue results from the lack of authentication prior to allowing alterations to the system configuration. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to issue commands to the physical equipment controlled by the device.
timeline:
2020-02-26 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2020-07-07 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2020-07-08 - Advisory Updated
credit: Ta-Lun Yen & Chizuru Toyama of TXOne IoT/ICS Security Research Labs (Trend Micro)
